comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: >>A.W. Fiske & Co. store and post office in an unknown town in Cheshire County, NH. I think this is Marlow, NH. "1875 - Amos Fiske's and Post Office - Fiske was Postmaster 1869-1886" Source: Marlow Bicentennial Program 1961

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content:
Yes, it probably is. Thanks again!
KPL
comment.authorname: Keene and Cheshire County (NH) Historical Photos

comment.author: 76186433@N02
comment._content:
Yes, it is Marlow, NH - the corner of Main and Mill Streets.  The building on the left is the Stephen C Joslin house.

Tracy Messer
Peterborough, NH
